alert.note: Alert for Greene; Hale; Marengo; Sumter (Alabama) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued February 05 at 10:24AM CST until February 06 at 7:12PM CST by NWS Birmingham
info.description: ...The Flood Warning continues for the following rivers in Alabama... Tombigbee River At Demopolis Lock and Dam affecting Hale, Greene, Sumter and Marengo Counties. .Flooding continues on the Tombigbee River and a flood warning remains in effect. Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Another statement will be issued by late tonight, or sooner if conditions warrant. && ...FLOOD WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL EARLY AFTERNOON TODAY... * WHAT...Minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Tombigbee River At Demopolis Lock and Dam. * WHEN...Until early afternoon today. * IMPACTS...At 68.0 feet, Flooding of lowlands in the area occurs and cattle should be moved to higher ground. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 7:15 AM CST Sunday, February 05 the stage was 68.0 feet. - Forecast...The river has already reached its crest and will continue to fall through the early afternoon today. - Flood stage is 68.0 feet. &&
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles.
